description: Least d such that period of continued fraction for sqrt(d) contains n (n^2+2 if n odd, (n/2)^2+1 if n even).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,3,0,-3,0,1).
example: a(3) = 11 because the continued fraction for the square root of 11 is 3, {3, 6}.
author: _Clark Kimberling_
